subject: Can any friend tell me about how to simulate HttpServletRequest & HttpServeltResponse & HttpSenssion.
msgSnippet: For our project is base on Servlet&Jsp tech, and we want to unit test out class. When a class use HttpServletRequest & HttpServetResponse object, and I test it
messageBody:
For our project is base on Servlet&Jsp tech, and we want to unit test out class.
When a class use HttpServletRequest & HttpServetResponse object, and I test it not under the real enginee(tomcat).How to construct a request and response and session?
 
Thx a lot.
